poemsDataJson.list_full: 瀬(せ)をはやみ 岩(いは)にせかるる 滝川(たきがは)の われても末(すゑ)に あはむとぞ思(おも)ふ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Though a swift stream is//Divided by a boulder//In its headlong flow,//Though divided, on it rushes,//And at last unites again.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Se o hayami|Iwa ni sekaruru|Taki-gawa no|Warete mo sue ni|Awan to zo omou
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: われてもすゑに あはむとそおもふ
poemsDataJson.author: 崇徳院(すとくいん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 仲をさかれても将来は一緒になろうという強い恋心
